Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Airbomber smiles.

"Good, then maybe we could have some one day." Airbomber=
 said. He kissed Infectra...

Sinister arives at the Team Ultima Base...
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:29 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Infect=
ra/Blizzard


  Infectra: Yes, I like them....Why?

  *Infectra asks Airbom=
ber*



  *Blizzard starts walking faster with Sinister*

    ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: F=
riday, August 04, 2000 5:54 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    "Maybe, who knows=
. We'll grow old together. Do you like children?" Airbomber asked.

    "Ye=
s! Let's go!" Sinister said. He started walking faster...
      ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:45 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


   =
   Blizzard/Infectra

      *Blizzard smiles*

      Blizzard: Okay, let's =
hurry so we don't miss anything else like maybe a nice battle.

      *Bliz=
zard says to Sinister*



      *Infectra smiles when Airbomber hugs her. S=
he didn't think love could happen so sudden and fast*

      Infectra: Ther=
e are probably tones of Maximals in there going on with lifes pretending we=
're not here.

      *infectra says and than grins*

      Infectra: If we =
wait long enough then we'll get to play in the leaves and snow and than rel=
ax in the sun.

      *Infectra says joking wondering when someone will not=
ice them*


        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
  =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:48 PM=

        Subject: Re: NBW


        "I don't know, let's go back there, now=
." Sinister said to Blizzard.

        Airbomber watched Stranato running a=
round and calling out. He laughed.

        "Stranato better get some help,=
 otherwise be might become a 'heel' again." Airbomber said. He smiled and h=
ugged Infectra, he never felt this way about a girl before....
          --=
--- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
       =
   Subject: Re: NBW


          Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



          *Twi=
ster looks at the sword and sighs*

          Twister: I'll have to get use=
d to the fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to trav=
el alone....

          *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the en=
ergon eagles into her arm compartment*


          *Blizzard looks at Sinis=
ter and smiles*

          Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the =
base.



          *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

          Infectra:=
 I trust the both of you......I did trust the others but....

          *In=
fectra sighs*

          Infectra: I need to stop thinking of things that u=
pset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times because there were hardl=
y none.

          *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


            ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
          =
  Subject: Re: NBW


            Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers s=
word.

            "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We hav=
e simular problems. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said t=
o Twister.

            Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks sho=
oting off in his eyes.

            Stranato calls out.

            "Hey, =
any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits down and look=
s to Infectra. He smiles.

            "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen=
 to us, they must know of the occurences happening. I trust Stranato, he's =
always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good, but he's good now=
." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...
              ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
           =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11=
:44 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW


              Twister/Blizzard/Infe=
ctra



              *Twister looks at Sinesis*

              Twister: I'=
ve decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too muc=
h to pull her away from the she loves....

              *Twister opens her=
 arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped li=
ke an eagle*

              Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite =
us as sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found Blizz=
ard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by acciden=
t.....

              *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



     =
         (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

        =
      *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Te=
am Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*


=

              *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Ba=
se*


                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: T=
HECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thurs=
day, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW


           =
     Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

         =
       Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.=


                "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

 =
               Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they =
were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...=

                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: il=
ovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
                  Subject: Re: NBW
=


                  Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


                  *In=
fectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



        =
          *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base =
awaits his repairs*



                  *Blizzard does a little skip out o=
f the cave walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand o=
ut towards his wanting to hold hands with him*



                  (OOC: T=
wister is out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

=
                  *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing a=
s how everyone was else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits a=
t the same table as Sinesis*

                  Twister: I don't know what =
I'm going to do....I end up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm w=
anted and me and my sister could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool=
 for believing such happiness could happen.....

                  *Twister=
 puts her double sided sword away stares at the table*


                  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
        =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Thursday, Aug=
ust 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                    Subject: NBW


                   =
 Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

                  =
  Gangon, still dying.

                    Deemos and Inzola confront one =
another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

               =
     Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                    "Hey, do I got =
the job?" He asked.

                    Time Bomb waited patiently and Lan=
d Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

=
                    Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.=
) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

                    Sinesis =
was healed and sat down next to Twister...
